You offer to run around the woods just outside town instead. You don't feel like sitting inside today, and you think you two will enjoy exploring the forest. It seems like a refreshing change from what you two normally do. You tell this to Rah and they don't object. They seem to like your idea also.

As you head to the opposite side of town, where the east exit that leads to the woods is, you make a stop at your house to use the restroom. Rah says they'll get a head start into the woods and meet you at the enterance of the forest. You serparate from Rah and head into your house.

When you reach the foot of the woods you don't see Rah. Then you hear him coming from off of the main path. You charges up to you breathless, gasping for air.

"You won't believe what I've found!" They say in exhaustion."Follow me! I've got something to show you!"

Whatever this is, Rah seems to be very excited about it.

Check it outTell Rah you're going to go home
